sentences.en: Although strictly illogical, Martin's interpretation of this paradox seems the best.
sentences.cn: 马丁对于这一悖论的解释尽管严格说来不合乎逻辑, 卻似乎是最好的解释了.

sentences.en: Are people unreasonable, illogical, self centered? Love them anyway.
sentences.cn: 人们不讲道理 、 思想谬误 、 自我中心 吗 ?无论如何,爱他们吧.

sentences.en: DO you have phobias - those illogical fears of perfectly ordinary thing?
sentences.cn: 你有对于那些再平常不过的事物的的恐惧 吗 ?

sentences.en: His nephew liked a logical argument, even about illogical things.
sentences.cn: 他的侄子喜欢逻辑争论, 即使是关于毫无逻辑的事情.

sentences.en: However, it is illogical and not in conformity with the clinical practice.
sentences.cn: 但是, 这种认定既不合逻辑,也不符合临床实际.

sentences.en: Many of his arguments are illogical.
sentences.cn: 他的许多观点都是不合逻辑的.

sentences.en: People are always unreasonable illogical, and self - centered, forgive them anyway.
sentences.cn: 人们总是无理取闹, 总是 自我 中心,但是不管怎样, 原谅他们.

sentences.en: People are often unreasonable, illogical and self - centered; Forgive them anyway.
sentences.cn: 如果人们不讲道理, 思想谬误, 自我 中心, 不管怎样,总是爱他们.

sentences.en: She has an illogical fear of insects.
sentences.cn: 她毫无道理地害怕昆虫。

sentences.en: She may think your reaction is crazy or illogical, but she cannot deny what you are feeling.
sentences.cn: 她可能觉得你的反应疯狂或者不合逻辑，但她不会否认你的感受。

sentences.en: Some of his arguments are illogical.
sentences.cn: 他的一些论证是不合逻辑的.

sentences.en: There are some people who will use any kind of argument, no matter how illogical, so long as they can score off an opponent.
sentences.cn: 有些人为了要驳倒对方; 不惜用任何不合逻辑的辩论.

sentences.en: These remarks sound reasonable, yet in fact they are quite illogical.
sentences.cn: 听起来有理, 其实是个因噎废食的逻辑.

sentences.en: These variations from custom are illogical, incomprehensible, and unmodifiable.
sentences.cn: 风俗的这些变化是不合逻辑的 、 不可理解的 、 不可修改的.

sentences.en: We are overcome by anguish at this illogical moment of humanity.
sentences.cn: 在这个人类最不合理的时代,我们都被痛苦征服了.
